All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages|Constant Field Values

S

scene - Static variable in class view.GUI
Scene to be displayed by the stage.
searchBar - Variable in class view.GUI
Area where user can type a keyword to search the database for recipes.
searchBarButton - Variable in class view.GUI
Magnifying glass button to the right of the search bar in the search menu.
searchBarHandler(KeyEvent) - Method in class view.GUI
Makes a search when the user types ENTER into the searchBar.
searchButton - Variable in class view.GUI
Button on sidebar that switches the scene to the Search menu.
searchButtonHandler() - Method in class view.GUI
Switches to the Search menu.
searchForRecipes() - Method in class view.GUI
Searches for recipes in the database based on what has been typed into the searchBar TextField.
searchInfo - Variable in class view.GUI
BorderPane that contains two Labels: recipesFound and filtersApplied.
searchResults - Variable in class view.GUI
Table of search results either from the Pantry or Search features.
searchToolbar - Variable in class view.GUI
Brown bar that contains the search bar, search button, and filter button above the recipe table.
secondBounce(Node) - Method in class view.GUI
Second bounce that plays after the animation in slideBounce(Node) finishes.
selectRecipe() - Method in class view.GUI
Determines what Recipe to set the currentRecipe pointer to.
slideBounce(Node) - Method in class view.GUI
Bounces a slide to the right.
At the end of the animation, a second bounce will play.
slideDown(Node, boolean) - Method in class view.GUI
Slides a Node down from off-screen into view.
slideLeft(Node) - Method in class view.GUI
Slides a Node left from off-screen into view.
At the end of the sliding animation, the Node will bounce twice.
slideRight(Node) - Method in class view.GUI
Slides a Node off-screen to the right.
slideUp(Node) - Method in class view.GUI
Slides a Node up from off-screen into view.
If this function is called from the Search menu, then the given Node will "bounce" at the end of the slide and the searchToolbar and searchInfo will also be given animations to play.
If this function is called from the Favorites menu, then the menuTitle will slide down once this animation completes.
stage - Static variable in class view.GUI
Used to display scene.
start(Stage) - Method in class view.GUI
Starts the GUI for the Apicius application.
stepsCheckBox - Variable in class view.GUI
Checkbox in the hideFilterMenu() that enables the stepsSlider.
stepsCol - Variable in class view.GUI
Column in the searchResults table that stores the number of steps it takes to make each recipe.
stepsSlider - Variable in class view.GUI
Slider that allows the user to filter recipes based on a minimum and maximum number of steps.
